title: Fag el-Gamous Cemetery
description: A large (300 acres), multiperiod (Old Kingdom through late Roman) cemetery located just beyond the arable land of the eastern Fayoum in Egypt. It likely served the nearby ancient settlements of Tanis, Philadelphia, and Selia.

properties.description: Rough centerpoint of cemetery areas under active excavation by the BYU team, after Muhlestein 2019, Figure 0.1.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Centerpoint of Excavated Areas
